duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute credit underwriting process and verify borrowing cause, repayment sources, and credit risks.
Identify strengths and weaknesses in repayment ability, capital, liquidity, and loan structure.
Clarify credit requests against established credit policy and create written credit reports.
Understand member financial statements and create financial projections with well-tested assumptions.
Summarize underwriting efforts in reports to focus loan committee discussion on key factors.
Support Relationship Management team and provide backup on customer service issues.
Suggest and implement credit process improvements to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in relevant field or equivalent experience in credit underwriting in production agriculture or commercial agribusiness lending.
